alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 8:50PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue through late evening, with the heaviest snow focusing on southwest Erie County from Angola to Eden and Boston. Snowfall rates of 2 to 3 inches per hour will continue in this area. A broader area of light to moderate snow will continue in surrounding areas of southern and Central Erie County, and far northern Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...The band of lake effect snow is expected to remain nearly stationary through late evening. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... West Seneca, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Marilla, Colden, Orchard Park, Silver Creek, Blasdell, Angola, North Collins, Woodlawn Beach State Park, Lake Erie State Park, Derby, Wales Center and Elma Center. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 56 and 59. SAFETY INFO... The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. &&

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
